description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: The CO set up a third-party monitoring mechanism to ensure regular and rigorous programmatic and financial monitoring in insecure areas. It also launched a conflict analysis study to assess the implications of the insecurity threat and its corollaries for the promotion and protection of child rights. Findings from the study will inform reflections for strengthening UNICEF's strategic footprint within the humanitarian-development-peace nexus. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/02/2020

title.narrative: The joint MTR/SMR is organized through a participatory approach with participa-tion of relevant stakeholders and a report is available

actual.value: 2019:Terms of Reference available for SMR/MTR postponed in 2020
